naslov: *SNIŽENA CIJENA* Atraktivna kamena kuća sa 9 stanova!! (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Posredujemo u prodaji prekrasne kamene stambene zgrade smještene na parceli od cca 900m2 nedaleko od Omiša i nadomak mnoštvo prekrasnih plaža (cca 150m)!! Zgrada je novo etažirana i sastoji se od prizemlja i 2 kata. Na svakom katu se nalaze po 3 jednosobna stana od cca 30m2, dakle, čak 9 legalnih stanova i 9 pripadajućih i označenih parking mjesta!! Kuću krase i velika okućnica sa 5 dodatnih objekata i terasa za grill, te 4 vrta! Udaljenost od Splita je 25km, Makarske 35km, aerodroma Split-Kaštela 48km. Ovdje se radi o zaista vrhunskoj prilici za investiciju. Naime, objekt je već u funkciji turizma sa izdašnom godišnjom dobiti. Obzirom da je posljednja renovacija bila prije nepunih godinu dana, novi vlasnik se može nesmetano nastaviti baviti iznajmljivanjem. Vlasništvo je uredno, 1/1. Razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani Ugovor o posredovanju, a što je u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Agencijska provizija iznosi 3%. Kontakt: 091 561 5115 (Željana) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A magnificent apartment stone house with a sea view is offered for sale, located on a spacious plot of approx. 900m2 nearby town of Omiš (distance:3km), Cetina river and many beautiful beaches!! The nearest beach is only 180 meters away! The building itself consists of 3 floors. On each floor there are 3 one-bedroom apartments of approx. 30m2, therefore, as many as 9 apartments with 9 associated and marked parking spaces!! The building is fully air-conditioned and is being sold fully furnished and equipped.  There are also an additional 4 gardens and a grill terrace! The whole Omiš region offers numerous activities, from swimming and sunbathing on the beaches to biking, rafting, hiking in the nearby hills and enjoying local Dalmatian cuisine in nearby restaurants. Split, as the largest city in the vicinity, further enriches this location by providing additional opportunities for entertainment, shopping and cultural activities. If you take a 40-minute drive to the East, you will arrive at one of the most popular port towns on the Dalmatian coast called Makarska, known for its Riviera beaches, seafront promenade and nightlife. Ferries connect the port to the nearby island of Brač. This is a truly superb investment opportunity. Namely, this house is already in the function of tourism that generates a generous annual profit. Considering that the latest renovation was completed less than a year ago, the new owner can focus and continue to rent the apartments. Property ownership is in order, 1/1. Viewing of the property is only possible with a signed Brokerage Agreement, which is in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Real Estate Brokerage Act. Agency commission is 3%. Contact: 091 561 5115 (Zeljana)
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
naziv_agencije: Studio Aura j.d.o.o. Agencija za nekretnine i consulting
